structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 55, effective July 13, 1984; and ch. 177, sec. 16, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247 instructs the Reviser of Statutes to adjust KRS references throughout the statutes to conform with the 2006 renumbering of the Financial Services Code, KRS Chapter 286. Such an adjustment has been made in this statute. . This section was amended by two 1984 Acts which do not appear to be in conflict and have been compiled together.
